Houkai energy detected, the level of this Houkai… Should be that "person". I think you are right, Mei. We got involved in some strange cases.
前方有崩坏源反应，看这种反应强度，应该是刚才的那个“人”。看来芽衣你说得没错，我们确实被卷入了某起事件中了呢。
前報に崩壊エネルギー反応。この反応からして、さっきの“人”みたい。あ～あ、先輩の言う通り、もう何かに巻き込まれちゃってるのかも。
전투 붕괴 에너지 반응. 이 반응으로 보아, 아까의 “인간” 같은데. 아~ 참, 선배 말대로, 이미 뭔가에 휘말렸을지도.

There's a Honkai Energy reaction detected ahead. Judging from this reaction, it looks like it's that "person" from before. Ahh, looks like you're right, Senpai, we seem to be involved in some sort of incident after all.

Há uma manifestação de Honkai à frente. A julgar pela força dessa manifestação deve vim daquela "pessoa" de agora. Mei, parece que, você estava certa, estávamos realmente envolvidos em um certo incidente.

There is a disintegration source reaction in front of us, and judging by the intensity of this reaction, it should be the "person" from earlier. It seems that you were right, Meiko, we are indeed involved in some kind of incident.
The previous report shows a disintegrating energy reaction. This reaction seems to be the "person" from earlier. Oh, my senior is right, maybe I'm already involved in something.

This place… If I'm right, it's also a forbidden area in the academy, abandoned schoolhouse. I heard there are ghosts here before…
这里…如果我没记错的话，好像也是学园的禁地之一，一座已经废弃了很久的校舍。据说还会闹鬼哦~
えっと……たしか、ここも学園の立ち入り禁止区域のひとつよ。ずっと使われてない校舎で、噂だとお化けなんかが出るらしいわ。
어... 확실히, 여기도 학원의 출입 금지 구역 중 하나야. 오랫동안 사용되지 않은 교사고, 소문에 의하면 유령 같은 게 나온다던데.
Umm... I think this is one of the academy's forbidden areas. It's a school building that hasn't been used for a very long time, and rumor has it, ghosts sometimes appear here.
Este lugar... Se bem me lembro, parece ser um dos locais fora dos limites da academia. Um edifício na academia que está abandonado há muito tempo. Diz-se que é assombrado.
This place... If I remember correctly, it seems to be one of the forbidden places of the school, a school building that has been abandoned for a long time. It is said to be haunted.
Let's see... ...... This is one of the off-limits areas of the school, if I remember correctly. The school building has been unused for a long time, and rumor has it that it is haunted.

portraits
msg
Humph, I don't believe that. However, it's a forbidden area, so there should be few zombies~
哼，这世上那有什么神啊鬼啊的。不过既然这里也是禁地的话就说明这个地方应该也没有多少死士，这里应该是安全的。
まっさか～！お化けなんているはずないよ。けど、立ち入り禁止区域だったんなら、ゾンビは少ないかも……多少は安全かな。
설마~! 유령 같은 건 있을 리 없어. 하지만 출입 금지 구역이었다면, 좀비는 적을지도... 어느 정도는 안전할 거야.
Hah, I don't believe that~! Ghosts don't exist in this world. But if it's a forbidden area, there might be less zombies... Maybe it's safer?
Ha, eu não acredito nisso! Não deveria haver nenhum fantasma aqui. Mas se for uma área proibida, pode haver menos zumbis... Talvez seja mais seguro?

Hmph, there is no such thing as gods and ghosts in this world. But since this is also a forbidden place it means that there should not be many dead soldiers in this place either, and this place should be safe.
It's not true! There shouldn't be any ghosts. But if it was a no-go zone, there might not be many zombies ......, so it might be a little safer.

msg
That's why you think here is not many zombies here?
你认为这里常年无人进入，所以也就不会有死士存在？
立ち入り禁止区域だと、ゾンビが少ないの？
출입 금지 구역이면 좀비가 적어?
Are there fewer zombies in a forbidden area?
Há menos zumbis em uma área proibida?
You think no one enters this place all year round, so there will be no dead soldiers present?
Are there fewer zombies in a no-go zone?

msg
Yes?
对呀，难道不是吗？
そうだよ。ゾンビも元は人間だからね。立ち入り禁止区域ってことは、崩壊発生時に人がいなかった可能性も高いでしょ？だから、ゾンビも少ないってわけ。
그래. 좀비도 원래는 인간이었으니까. 출입 금지 구역이라는 건, 붕괴 발생 시 사람이 없었을 가능성도 높잖아? 그래서 좀비도 적다는 거지.

Yeah, that's how it works, right? Zombies were originally humans too. If it's a forbidden area, there's a good chance that there were no people there before the Honkai outbreak occurred, right? That's why there are so few zombies. (TN: Fused the Chinese and Japanese translations together)
Sim, isso não está correto?
Yeah, isn't that right?
That's right. Zombies used to be people, too. If it's a no-go zone, there's a good chance that no one was here when the collapse occurred. That's why there are so few zombies.

そうなのね……。でも、何だかさっきから後をつけられているような気がするんだけど……。

21: speaker
portraits
msg
Kiana, did you say there is not many zombies here?
琪亚娜，你不是说这个地方不会有死士出现的吗？为什么会变成这种情况？
キ、キアナちゃん、ここにはゾンビが少ないんじゃなかったの？何で私たち、ゾンビに囲まれてるのかしら！？
키, 키아나 쨩, 여긴 좀비가 적지 않았어? 왜 우리, 좀비에게 둘러싸인 거야!?
K-Kiana-chan, didn't you say there would be less zombies here? Why are we being surrounded by them?!
Kiana, você não disse que este lugar não deveria ter muitos zumbis? Então, por que estamos nesta situação agora?
Kiana, didn't you say that no dead soldiers would appear in this place? Why has it turned into this situation?
Kiana, Kiana, I thought there weren't many zombies here? Why are we surrounded by zombies!

I think they were attracted by she.
如果我没有猜错的话，这些死士应该是被那个家伙吸引过来的。
たぶん、アイツがゾンビを引き寄せてるんだと思う……。
아마, 그 녀석이 좀비를 끌어들이고 있는 것 같아…….

Acho que ela está atraindo os zumbis.
If I'm not wrong, these dead men should be attracted by that guy.
Maybe that guy is attracting zombies. ......

She? Do you mean the girl with "tail"?
那个家伙…你是说那个长着尾巴的“女孩”么？
アイツって……あの尻尾がある子のこと？
그 녀석이라면…… 저 꼬리가 있는 아이 말이야?
You mean... the girl with the tails?
Ela... Você quer dizer a garota com as caudas?
That guy...you mean the "girl" with the tail?
Is he the one with the ...... tail?
speaker
portraits
msg
Yes! There is Houkai source on that guy, zombies can feel that. And more Houkai energy they got, more powerful they will be.
对！那个家伙身上有崩坏源反应，而崩坏源有着聚集崩坏能的特性，那些死士也是因为感应到了才会聚集过来。而时间越长，崩坏源吸收的崩坏能就会更多，变得更加强大。
そう！アイツには崩壊源反応が出てるからね。崩壊源は崩壊エネルギーを集めるだけじゃなく、ゾンビたちも一緒に集めちゃうんだよ。しかも、崩壊エネルギーをどんどん吸収するから、時間が経つほど力も強くなる。
그래! 그 녀석에게는 붕괴원 반응이 나오고 있어. 붕괴원은 붕괴 에너지를 모을 뿐만 아니라, 좀비들도 함께 모아 버린다고. 게다가, 붕괴 에너지를 계속 흡수하기 때문에, 시간이 갈수록 힘도 강해져.

That's right! That girl had a Honkai Source reaction. A Honkai Source not only attracts Honkai Energy, but also attracts zombies. Moreover, it absorbs the attracted Honkai Energy, so it gets stronger as time goes by.

Sim! Essa garota teve uma forte reação da Fonte Honkai, e a Fonte Honkai tem a propriedade de coletar Energia Honkai. Esses zumbis estão se aproximando porque eles sentiram isso. Quanto mais o tempo passa, mais energia Honkai a Fonte Honkai absorve e mais poderosa ela se torna.

Yes! That guy had a disintegration source reaction, and the disintegration source has the property of gathering disintegration energy, and those dead soldiers gathered over because they sensed it. And the longer it takes, the more Avalanche Energy the Avalanche Source will absorb and become more powerful.

Yes! He's got a decay source reaction. The decay source not only collects decay energy, it also collects zombies with it. And since it absorbs more and more decay energy, the longer it takes, the stronger it becomes.
speaker
portraits
msg
So… I think it will be wrose if we continue running…
那我们这样继续逃下去岂不是非常不妙？
時間が経つほど、強くなる……。じゃあ、このまま逃げ回ってたら、いずれ手に負えなくなるんじゃ……？
시간이 갈수록, 강해진다……. 그럼, 이대로 도망 다니다간, 언젠가 감당할 수 없게 되는 거 아냐……?
The more time passes, the stronger it becomes, huh... So if we keep running away, wouldn't it just become an even bigger problem...?
Quanto mais o tempo passa, mais forte ele se torna, hein... Então, se continuarmos fugindo, isso não se tornará um problema ainda maior...?
Then wouldn't it be very bad for us to continue to escape like this?
The more time goes by, the stronger they get. ...... So, if we keep running away from this, it will eventually get out of hand. ......
speaker
portraits
msg
We were planned to escape, now we come back to this place again, we need to do something!
之前我还想着先离开这所学园都市再做打算…不过既然我们又回到了这里，也就不能再对那个家伙坐视不管了！
うん、そういうこと。あんなの無視して学園から脱出できれば一番良かったんだけど、もう後には引けなそうだし……勝ち目がなくなる前に、ここらで決着をつけよう！
응, 그런 거야. 저런 건 무시하고 학원에서 탈출할 수 있으면 제일 좋았겠지만, 이젠 뒤로 물러설 수도 없을 것 같고…… 이길 희망이 없어지기 전에, 여기서 결판을 내자!

Yep, that's right. It would have been great if we could just ignore it and escape the Academy City, but it seems like there's no turning back now... Let's settle this here and now before we lose all hope of winning!
Eu queria deixar a Cidade Academia antes de pensar em fazer planos... Mas agora que estamos de volta aqui, acho que não podemos mais ignorá-la!
I was thinking of leaving this school city before making plans... but now that we're back here, we can't just ignore that guy anymore!

Yeah, that's what I meant. It would have been best if we could have ignored that thing and escaped from the academy, but it looks like we can't back out now, so ...... let's get this over with before we lose our chance to win!
msg
Maybe we should talk to her first! I'm also very interested in her~
我们要主动出击，找对方谈谈才行！而且我也对那个家伙身上发生的事有点兴趣呢~
ただ、無闇に傷つけるってことだけはしたくないの。戦うのは最終手段、話し合いで何とか解決しましょ！それに、アイツに何があったのかは私も気になってたし、聞けば何か事情を話してくれるかも！
다만, 함부로 상처 주는 것만은 하고 싶지 않아. 싸우는 건 최후의 수단, 대화로 어떻게든 해결하자! 게다가, 그 녀석에게 무슨 일이 있었는지 나도 궁금했으니, 물어보면 무슨 사정을 말해줄지도!

However, I don't want to hurt anyone unnecessarily. Fighting is the last resort, let's resolve this through discussion! Besides, I'm also quite curious about what happened to her and that girl, and if we ask her, she might tell us something!

Eu só não quero machucar as pessoas sem saber. Lutar é o último recurso, vamos conversar e resolver isso! Além disso, tenho me perguntado o que aconteceu com ela, e se perguntarmos a ela, talvez ela nos diga o que está acontecendo!
We have to take the initiative and talk to each other to do that! And I'm also a little interested in what happened to that guy~

I just don't want to hurt them without any consideration. Fighting is a last resort. Let's talk it out and work something out! Besides, I was wondering what happened to him, and if I ask him, he might be able to tell me what's going on!
